title: Runaway Nano-Swarm Zone Adventure #4
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Decontamination Airlock
rooms.description: A sterile white chamber with warning lights flashing red along the walls. Through the reinforced viewport, you can see a gray metallic swarm moving like liquid mercury through the adjacent corridors. Emergency klaxons blare intermittently. Decontamination spray nozzles hang from the ceiling. The air smells of ozone and chemical disinfectant.

items.name: emergency equipment locker
items.description: A red metal locker with emergency supplies and protective gear

items.name: incident report datapad
items.description: A digital tablet displaying an emergency incident report
items.text: INCIDENT REPORT: Nano swarm containment breach at 0847 hours. Facility established 2089. Chief Scientist Dr. Elena Vasquez initiated emergency protocols. Lead Engineer Marcus Webb sealed contaminated sectors. All personnel must evacuate via emergency pods. Combination to secure storage: facility founding year.

items.name: wall mounted control panel
items.description: A control panel with facility status displays and warning indicators
items.text: FACILITY STATUS: Nano Swarm Containment Facility Alpha. Established 2089. Current Status: CRITICAL BREACH. Contamination Level: 87%. Evacuation Required. Emergency pods located in Pod Bay Gamma.

items.name: secure storage box
items.description: A reinforced storage box with a four digit combination lock

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard labeled AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY

items.name: decontamination station
items.description: A station with chemical showers and protective equipment

items.name: safety procedures manual
items.description: A laminated manual with emergency protocols
items.text: SAFETY PROTOCOLS: In case of nano swarm breach, proceed immediately to research laboratory to gather containment data. Dr. Vasquez maintains all critical research files. Engineer Webb controls facility systems from the laboratory.

items.name: reinforced laboratory door
items.description: A heavy security door with a card reader, leading to the research laboratory

rooms.name: Research Laboratory
rooms.description: A high tech laboratory filled with sophisticated equipment and holographic displays. Microscopes and analysis stations line the workbenches. Through the observation windows, you can see the nano swarm pulsing with an eerie silver glow. Computer terminals blink with warning messages. The sealed door to the evacuation pod bay stands at the far end.

items.name: main research workstation
items.description: Dr. Vasquez's primary workstation with multiple monitors and data storage

items.name: research log datapad
items.description: A tablet containing Dr. Vasquez's research notes
items.text: Research Log Entry 247: The nano swarm exhibits unprecedented adaptive behavior. Our containment protocols have failed. Engineer Webb and I are implementing emergency shutdown. The swarm originated in Containment Sector Seven. Only authorized personnel may access evacuation pods.

items.name: evacuation protocol document
items.description: Official evacuation procedures for facility emergencies
items.text: EVACUATION PROTOCOLS: In case of catastrophic containment failure, all personnel must evacuate via Pod Bay Gamma. Security verification required. Questions: Who is the chief scientist? Where did the swarm originate? Who controls facility systems?

items.name: reinforced observation window
items.description: A thick window overlooking the contaminated containment area
items.text: Through the window, you see Containment Sector Seven completely overrun with the silvery nano swarm. The swarm moves with disturbing intelligence, probing every surface for weaknesses.

items.name: facility computer terminal
items.description: A terminal displaying facility systems and personnel records
items.text: PERSONNEL DATABASE: Dr. Elena Vasquez - Chief Scientist, Nano Technology Division. Marcus Webb - Lead Engineer, Facility Systems. Status: Emergency evacuation in progress. All personnel report to Pod Bay Gamma immediately.

items.name: equipment storage cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet containing research equipment and protective gear

items.name: protective hazmat suit
items.description: A full body protective suit with nano particle filtration

items.name: containment breach report
items.description: A detailed report on the containment failure
items.text: BREACH ANALYSIS: Nano swarm escaped from Containment Sector Seven at 0847 hours. Swarm has compromised 87% of facility. Dr. Vasquez recommends immediate evacuation. Engineer Webb has sealed all non essential sectors. Evacuation pods are the only safe exit.

items.name: sealed pod bay door
items.description: A massive security door leading to the evacuation pod bay. A biometric panel displays three security verification questions.

password_questions.question: Who is the chief scientist?
password_questions.hint: Check the incident report and personnel database

password_questions.question: Where did the nano swarm originate?
password_questions.hint: Read the research log and containment breach report

password_questions.question: Who controls the facility systems?
password_questions.hint: The personnel database and reports mention the lead engineer

rooms.name: Emergency Evacuation Pod Bay
rooms.description: You have reached the evacuation pod bay! A sleek emergency escape pod sits in its launch cradle, its systems humming with power. Status lights glow green across the control panel. Through the launch tube viewport, you can see the sky above. The pod is ready for immediate departure. You are safe from the nano swarm here.

items.name: emergency escape pod
items.description: A streamlined evacuation vehicle designed for rapid facility escape

items.name: launch control panel
items.description: The pod's control system showing all green status indicators
items.text: ESCAPE POD STATUS: All systems nominal. Launch sequence ready. Destination: Safe zone coordinates uploaded. Estimated time to safety: 3 minutes.

items.name: emergency distress beacon
items.description: A beacon that will alert rescue teams to your location

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You board the escape pod and initiate the launch sequence. The pod rockets away from the contaminated facility as the nano swarm spreads below. Through the viewport, you watch the facility shrink into the distance. You have escaped the runaway nano swarm and survived the crisis. Rescue teams are en route to your coordinates. You win!
